"A.P.242/2/17 10:00":
"Welcome back, you two. You went to meet the
A.I.S. specialist like Sara requested, right?"
"Yeah. A woman named Ludmilla."
"She seemed really absorbed."
"She seemed pretty dependable."
"Ahaha... She didn't seem like a bad person."
"Ahaha... She seemed like the type to focus hard on something, so I guess you could call her dependable."
"ARKS's most talented are nothing but quirky. Just like you two."
"However, she's the one that suggested we make them space battle-ready right away. And then she got right to work on making it a reality."
"It's abundantly clear that she possesses an incredible level of genius... She's really something else."
"What have you been doing?"
"Have you finished preparing everything?"
"Some way to locate Shiva, and a plan B."
"...That's right. We have to be mentally prepared for anything that could happen."
"ARKS has always had plenty of intel on the Darkers you've fought up until now."
"We've been able to sense where they are, and recognize the Dark Falz omens and make the appropriate preparations."
"But now, we're up against something entirely different. They have the upper hand when it comes to intel."
"That's why we need to prepare ourselves both physically and mentally, so we'll be ready for whatever happens..."
"Xiao?"
"...Damn. So this is our difference."
"Xiao?!"
"E-Emergency alert! Dimensional distortion detected! Enemies are appearing!"
"Their location is... inside the Mothership! Confirmed enemy readings in the Mothership!"
"There's no need to calculate anything. If you crush something's head, it will perish."
"How Do We Resist The Demise"
"A Means to Oppose Demise"
